com.freedomotic.bus

Class BusMessagesListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.freedomotic.bus.BusMessagesListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.jms.MessageListener

    public class BusMessagesListener
extends Object
implements javax.jms.MessageListener
    MessageListener implementation (former AbstractBusConnector class)

    Receives an ObjectMessage (it can be an event or a command) and sends it to his BusConsumer

    This is the bus hook for any BusConsumer that should register itself in this listener.

    Author:
    Freedomotic Team
    See Also:
    BusConsumer

      • consumeEventFrom

        public void consumeEventFrom(String topicName)
        Registers on a event topic. It is a Virtual Topic in activemq lingo
        Parameters:
        topicName -

      • subscribeCrossInstanceEvents

        public void subscribeCrossInstanceEvents(String topicName)
        Subscribes a messaging topic. The message will be received by ALL the subscribers. It's not a virtual topic as in consumeEventFrom(). DO NOT USE IT IF YOU ARE NOT AWARE OF THE CONSEQUENCES. USE consumeEventFrom() instead.
        Parameters:
        topicName -

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Unsubscribes from all messaging channels (topics and queues)
        (invocations should be life cycle managed)
